paper_metadata.title: DNA repair gene polymorphisms and clinical outcome of patients with primary small cell carcinoma of esophagus
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the BRCA2 gene variant Asn372His and its association with clinical outcomes in patients with small cell carcinoma of the esophagus.

patients.phenotype: Primary small cell carcinoma of the esophagus

functional_data.summary: The study did not provide specific functional data for the BRCA2 variant.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was included in the analysis of SNPs but did not show a significant association with PFS or OS.
key_quotes: The variant allele frequency for BRCA2-Asn372His polymorphism was 13.9%.

tables_processed.table_caption: Association of genotypes with PFS and OS

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information regarding the BRCA2 variant.
